title: Infiltration Thriller Sound Effects
description: Time to strike disturbing frequencies in your audience with the next level of movie trailer sound design! Gain prestige and unlock cinematic audio excellence/admiration with our newest movie trailer sound effects library “Infiltration Thriller”.
longDescription:
Audio Demos

This is a psychological thriller sound pack which features over 500+ movie studio ready/quality soundscapes, anxious filled trailer hits, big impacts, attention grabbers, spine-chilling suspense elements, scares, designed risers, infinite risers, Shepard tones, transitions, whooshes, drones, signals and everything you need to create compelling mind-bending thrills, high emotion pulling promos, epic movie trailers, game scenes and immersive audio experiences.

Hang on to your seats, YOU are not going to want to miss this! Infiltration Thriller not only provides you with all the designed sound effect essentials needed to create modern trailers and inspired box office hits but also offers some of the sought-after Hollywood movie trailer sound effects on the market to date like the infamous Shepard Tone! Inside you will find that each sound is handcrafted and perfected for maximum dynamics, scare tactics and the industry standard of tension inducing effect. Today’s leading sound designers, from across the world, stay current by gaining access to industry standard movie trailer sound with Infiltration Thriller.

With this sound pack, you get to ingrain mind-boggling contemplation with ease, shock and awe moments, big fearful cutscenes, horrible feelings, the evil thing is lurking around the corner & so much more. Enjoy a darkly delicious and decadent curated selection of Hollywood sound design dynamics and rich cinematic experiences!

Get the ultimate collection of suspense and psychological movie trailer sound effects! Your audience will surely love and appreciate the experience you take them on. with Infiltration Thriller!
technicalDetails:
Product details:

  • 518 mixed and mastered audio files, Perfect for games, movies, film, trailers & more
  • 2.24 GB of audio samples
  • A Go-To Movie Trailer Sound Effects Library
  • 76 Atmospheres – Long, Mood Setting, Startling, Tension, and Suspense Soundscapes
  • 11 Booms – Low, Deep, Sinister
  • 32 Drones like Underground Rumble, Electric Disturb, Iron Rain, Eerie, Liquefied Signals
  • 63 Hits, Discharges, Strikes, Slams, Mangled Violins, Jump Scares, Thrills
  • 61 Impacts like Bowed Metal, Violins, Distorted Shock, Heavy Drop, Explosive, Hammer Stroke
  • 61 Risers and Buildups – all designed and tension-filled sounds
  • 65 Shepard Tones – Ascending, Descending, Infinite Build Ups, Ghostly, Mind-Bending, Psycho
  • 16 Tonal Musical Elements – Tortured Strings, Eerie Bell Frequencies, Anxious Bass Pluck Patterns
  • 76 Transitions Long – Slow and Long, Designed, Bowed Whooshes
  • 58 Transitions Short – Quick Whooshes, Designed, Bowed China Reveal, Dark Movement, Electronic Buzz Pass-bys and Screams

Number of Audio Waves: 518

Number of Audio Cues: 518

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX Loop: No

Minutes of Audio Provided: 210

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox1, Oculus/SteamVR/HTC Vive/GearVR, Linux, HTML5

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox1, Oculus/SteamVR/HTC Vive/GearVR, Linux, HTML5

Documentation: Content List
